Python-Lumerical
  • Examples
  • Example_MMI_EME
  • View page source

Example_MMI_EMEÔÉÅ

This is an example of using the library to create an 1x2 MMI in Lumerical MODE and set the EME Solver.

 1
 2# Import some Python Libs 
 3import importlib
 4import numpy as np
 5import os
 6import os.path
 7import sys
 8
 9# Import the Constructor 
10from Constructor import Constructor, Charge
11from Constructor import loadingBar
12from Constructor import Logfile
13from Constructor import Help
14
15# =============================================================================
16# Open File
17# =============================================================================
18
19
20Lumerical_Python_Path = "C:/Program Files/Lumerical/v242/api/python/lumapi.py"
21
22Added_Material_Path = "...../Materials.mdf"
23
24
25# =============================================================================
26# Scripts Test
27# =============================================================================
28
29
30
31# # If you need Help with hot to import the Constructor run the line below 
32# Help()
33
34# Call object Constructor
35obj = Constructor(file, "EME", MaterialPath )
36
37
38# # Close Lumerical 
39# obj.Close()
40
41
42
43# # When Lumerical is started you can use the inbuild Help to construct and run your simulation 
44# obj.Help()
45# obj.Help("Objects")
46# obj.Help({"Objects": 2})
47
48# obj.Help('Solvers')
49# obj.Help({"Solvers": 2})
50# obj.Help('Start Simulation')
51# obj.Help({"Start Simulation": 2})
52
53
54
55
56# MMI Parameters
57Parameters = {}
58# "LiNbO3_20deg_X cut" is an Custom material added from me 
59# "SiO2 (Glass) - Palik" is an Lumerical Material
60Parameters['Material'] = ["SiO2 (Glass) - Palik", "LiNbO3_20deg_X cut"]
61Parameters['Substrate Height'] = 1e-6
62Parameters['MMI Width'] = 10e-6
63Parameters['MMI Length'] = 20e-6
64Parameters['angle'] = 30
65Parameters['WG Height'] = 0.3e-6
66Parameters['WG Width'] = 1e-6
67Parameters['WG Length'] = 5e-6
68Parameters['Position Offset'] = 3e-6
69Parameters['Offset Input'] = 0
70Parameters['Slab Height'] = 0.3e-6
71Parameters['Taper'] = False
72Parameters['Taper Length'] = 5e-6
73Parameters['Taper Width'] = 3e-6
74
75
76
77# Solver Parameters
78Parameters['y res'] = 0.1e-6
79Parameters['z res'] = 0.1e-6
80Parameters['Wavelength'] = 1.550e-6
81Parameters["Mode"] = "fundamental TE mode"
82Parameters["Port Span"] = [2.5e-6, 2.5e-6, 2.5e-6]
83
84
85
86
87# Create MMI
88obj.MMI2x1(Parameters)  
89
90# Create Solver and set boundaries
91obj.Solver("MMI2x1", "EME", Parameters)
92
93# Strat Simulations
94obj.StartEMESimulation() 
95
96
